thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I dropped my car off on a Saturday morning, early, the kid that helped me Matt was very informative, friendly and courteous. he gave me the same exact tires and price I got the previous time I went. He also didn't try to sell me anything that was more expensive and talk me into something that I didn't want. He also made suggestions that were in my good interest for my tires. I do a lot of driving because I commute about 80 miles round trip a day to work. The time I went before that same exact experience.
